meta.title: Traditional Kneading Method
meta.subtitle: The authentic Pacific way of preparing Kava – for maximum potency and a true experience.

overview.intro: The traditional kneading method is the original Pacific way of preparing Kava, practiced for over 3,000 years. It provides the strongest extraction and the most authentic taste experience.

alert.title: Why this method?
alert.text: Kavalactones are fat-soluble, not water-soluble. They adhere to the starch particles of the root. Through mechanical kneading, these particles are released and emulsified in water – hence this method is so effective.

essential.name: Kava root powder
essential.note: 15-50g depending on experience and desired strength

optional.name: Chaser (fruit)
optional.note: Pineapple, orange, or mango against the taste

preparation.title: Preparation

alert.title: Important: Empty Stomach
alert.text: Always drink Kava on a empty stomach – at least 3-4 hours after the last meal. Otherwise, the effect is significantly weaker or may not occur at all!

preparation.text: Before you begin, ensure that all materials are ready. The preparation should be done in one go, without interruptions.

items.title: Measure Powder
items.description: Measure the desired amount of Kava powder.
details: Beginner: 15-20g per serving
Regular: 25-35g per serving
Experienced: 35-50g per serving
Use medium grind powder for best results
items.tip: Use our dosing calculator for personalized recommendations based on your strain and experience.

items.title: Prepare Water
items.description: Prepare warm water in a large bowl.
details: Water temperature: 35-45°C (hand warm)
Water amount: 300-500ml per serving
Optional: Add 1-2 tablespoons of coconut milk or whole milk
NEVER use boiling water!
items.tip: Fat significantly improves the extraction of Kavalactones. Coconut milk is traditional and ideal for taste.

items.title: Soaking
items.description: Let the powder soak in the filter bag.
details: Put the powder in the nut milk bag (75-100 micron)
Close or twist the bag
Submerge in warm water
Let it rest for 5 minutes to allow the powder to moisten
items.tip: Soaking is important! It opens the plant fibers and makes the Kavalactones more accessible.

items.title: Kneading
items.description: The most important step: vigorous kneading under water.
details: Knead and massage the bag vigorously under water
Rhythmically press, squeeze, and wring
The water will become increasingly milky-brown
Knead for at least 10 minutes, better 15 minutes
items.tip: The longer and stronger you knead, the stronger the Kava will be. The color should resemble that of coffee with milk.

items.title: Squeeze Out
details: Remove the bag from the water
Squeeze firmly over the bowl
Wring several times until little liquid comes out
Optional: Repeat with fresh water for a second extraction
items.tip: The second extraction ('Second Wash') is weaker but still effective. Ideal for stretching.

items.title: Serve
details: Pour into a coconut shell (Bilo) or cup
Traditionally, Kava is drunk in one go ('Chug')
Do not sip – this prolongs the bitter taste
Have a 'chaser' (piece of fruit) ready
items.tip: Clap your hands once before drinking and say 'Bula!' – that is the traditional Pacific way.

items.name: Second Wash
items.text: After the first extraction, you can knead the powder again with fresh water. The 'Second Wash' is weaker but ideal for stretching or for beginners.

items.name: Fat Boost
items.text: Eat a small, fatty meal 30-60 minutes after the Kava. This can trigger a 'second wave' of effect as the fat releases remaining Kavalactones.

items.name: Reverse Tolerance
items.text: Many newcomers feel little during their first time. The body needs to 'get used' to Kavalactones. Drink Kava for several days in a row for the full effect.

items.name: Temperature Check
items.text: Test the water with your elbow – it should feel pleasantly warm, like bath water for a baby. Too hot destroys the active ingredients!

items.consequence: Destroys Kavalactones and makes the Kava ineffective

items.solution: Knead patiently for at least 10-15 minutes

items.consequence: Little effect, as Kavalactones are not water-soluble
